<template>
    <button>
        <slot></slot>
    </button>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'MyButton',
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
    .btn-border {
        border: 1px solid #fff;
        border-radius: 5px;
        background-color: transparent;
        color: #fff;
        padding: 7px 12px;
        font-size: 18px;
        line-height: 22px;
        cursor: pointer;
        &:hover {
            color: $pink;
            background-color: ;
        }
    }
</style>
